version_description:
-Fixed middle row not showing on the iPhone 6s
-Added Loading Indicators
-Interface Improvements

-Fixed Loading Issues On Slower Connections
-Major Performance Improvements

Help us improve the app by sending suggestions over at support@unicornapps.com

We don't want to nag you to review the app so if you have a minute please drop a review letting us know what you think.

A long due update with :
-Major Performance Improvements
-UI & UX Improvements
-Bug Fixes

-Bug Fixes:
- Fixed many loading issues
- Improved loading speeds in slower connections
- Fixed loading spinner bug
- Fixed wallpapers thumbnails not loading properly
- Fixed missing animation on Settings screen
- Many more bug fixes and improvements
- Performance Improvements
- Better UX
- Minor UI Improvements
